short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and manage Browser Automations and Visual Testing for Superadmin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Superadmin is a No-Code Visual Automation Testing solution for fast moving teams and busy engineers. Superadmin makes testing light speed quick, with advanced integration into Chrome, support for scheduling tests, and more. 

Superadmin supports visual regression testing in the cloud using a browser farm, and advanced AI features to detect visual changes before they ship to production.

Features
- Extremely fast and user-friendly to setup tests
- No-Code features for developers and non-developers alike
- Add actions such as click, input, and wait for page navigation into a test
- Select elements in the active page to run an automation action on them
- Edit/preview test automations
- Save automation tests right to your superadmin.so account

Go to superadmin.so to login and schedule your tests to run automatically

Go to superadmin.so/docs to setup a test-runner in your CI to run tests in different environments and before faulty code hits production

Learn more at https://superadmin.so
